item.title: Sheri add a quote by A.A. Milne
Sheri add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Henry Ward Beecherr
item.description: "Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?" -- Henry Ward Beecherr

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Marie Curie
item.description: "Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained." -- Marie Curie

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "The only real stumbling block is fear of failure. In cooking you've got to have a what-the-hell attitude." -- Julia Child

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Abraham Verghese
item.description: "The world turns on our every action, and our every omission, whether we know it or not." -- Abraham Verghese

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Mortimer J. Adler
item.description: "In the case of good books, the point is not to see how many of them you can get through, but rather how many can get through to you." -- Mortimer J. Adler

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Robert Bly
item.description: "I am proud only of those days that pass in undivided tenderness." -- Robert Bly
